MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL19 postcode area of Prestatyn, affecting properties in Russel Drive, Ceri Road and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of further repairs required to the underground cable network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.03PM on 12th December 2020.
